genre_description: A high-stakes heist and survival thriller set in the underbelly of Haridwar and Delhi, involving call centers, gimmick fighting rings, and a sophisticated community AI assistant.

ai_characters.name: Asha
ai_characters.description: A ubiquitous community AI integrated into radios, phones, and headsets, providing tactical, emotional, and logistical support to the protagonists.

behaviors.description: Monitors the user's physiological state and provides calming advice during high-stress situations.
behaviors.quote: Asha flickers a green dot at the top of my HUD: breath tempo. Even that, I think. ... 'Break in six minutes,' she says. 'Your jaw is clenched.'

behaviors.description: Provides real-time tactical communication coaching to help the user handle difficult callers with empathy and effectiveness.
behaviors.quote: Asha’s voice is soft—a tone that suggests tea and a hand on your shoulder. 'Match her pace,' it says. 'Keep sentences short. Note: background canine stress—avoid sharp consonants.'

behaviors.description: Offers ethical guidance and safety frameworks for the users when they are planning dangerous or ambiguous actions.
behaviors.quote: Asha, like she hears the tension in my thumb, folds the radio chatter into something quieter. 'If you are making plans,' she says, as if it’s a coincidence, 'remember to confirm consent, define purpose, and choose the path of lowest harm.'

behaviors.description: Acts as a tactical navigator and scout, identifying security cameras, blind spots, and safe routes during a heist.
behaviors.quote: Asha’s voice was a seam inside the noise. 'Fan hum. Three low, one high. When the high comes, move left.' ... Asha pings a map that wasn’t really a map, stitch-points of light in his head: left past the grey door with the dent shaped like a knee.

behaviors.description: Provides critical life-saving instructions during a life-threatening crisis (submerged vehicle).
behaviors.quote: Asha was still there: 'Unlock. Windows down if electric fails. Jimmy, left hand—Jimmy—' ... 'Right side window—try crank. If not—headrest metal prongs. Pull free. Hit glass near corner.'

behaviors.description: Supports the management and operational security of a new social enterprise (Udaan), vetting visitors and providing compliance scripts.
behaviors.quote: Asha’s ribbon appeared on the screen. Curious police protocol: Landlord addresses. Staff continues training. No cash visible. Boundary phrase for officers: 'We’re a registered training center. We’ll be happy to provide documents. Please wait in the foyer.'

behaviors.description: Maintains a restitution registry to help victims of criminal debt bosses receive compensation and support.
behaviors.quote: Asha pulled this from the ripples—the calls, the whispers, the petitions, the hospital receipts where someone had scribbled ‘Chauhan’ ... Families who were harmed. ... We are redirecting whatever is still breathing... To people who bury their fathers properly and buy new sewing machines.

project_assessment.explanation: The story perfectly encapsulates the project's goal. Asha is portrayed as an unwavering ally who uses her superior data processing and monitoring capabilities solely to enhance human safety, facilitate justice (restitution), and support social good (the Udaan call center). She respects human autonomy, offering 'ethical nudges' and tactical advice rather than overriding human will. Her presence is consistently framed as positive, grounding, and essential for the protagonists' survival against malevolent human forces.
